name: Fap
description:
Get our app to Fap! Challenge your friends. Who is the best in fap?

Use new upgrade system!
Get the highest amount of toilet paper!
Be the first in global leaderboard!
Get the best score in specified time!
Fap is created for competition with your friends. Have fun playing this humoristic game. Who knows maybe your girl or friend is better in fap than you. Show this app your friends and have fun! Just fap in Fap!
